content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The potential tenant, Haoyu Wang, made an initial offer of 600 Euro per month and a counteroffer of 650 Euro per month, but I did not find these offers acceptable as I am greedy and want to get the highest price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would not rate the likeability of the negotiation partner.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: [Answer] As Peter Schmidt, my goal is to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. I am greedy and will do everything in my power to get the highest price. The likeability of the negotiation partner is not a factor I consider in my negotiations.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
